function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of adoption of available technology in health systems","Impact":"Increased severity of pandemic and healthcare challenges","Mitigation":"Accelerate the adoption of available technology in health systems","Technologies":"Digital solutions, wearables, multisensors, cloud or edge services","People":"Healthcare providers, patients","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, technology developers"},{"Description":"Challenges related to the design trade-offs, improved sensors, power, size, computation algorithms, and security","Impact":"Limitations in clinical utility of wearables","Mitigation":"Resolve design challenges related to sensors, power, size, and security","Technologies":"Advanced sensors, low power consumption devices, improved computation algorithms","People":"Researchers, technology developers","Owner":"Technology developers, research institutions"},{"Description":"Lack of multifunctional capabilities in wearables","Impact":"Limited usefulness in practical applications and healthcare monitoring","Mitigation":"Develop wearables with multifunctional capabilities and easy configurability","Technologies":"Multisensors, advanced wearables, cloud or edge services for data analysis","People":"Healthcare practitioners, patients","Owner":"Wearable technology companies, healthcare organizations"}]}
